QuestData.Title: Strike the Earth!
QuestData.Description: In case you didn't notice, the land here in the Wetlands is pretty messed up. Floods, earthquakes... and on top of it all, even the ground's got a wild hair now.$B$BI never thought we'd be attacked by our own dig site, but sure enough, big chunks of it are now rampaging around trying to flatten any dwarf they see.$B$BYou look like a strong, strapping young $r... mind going down there and slapping some sense into the clods?
QuestData.RewardText: That's showin' em what for! Good on you.
